abstract.t: This document discusses types of Instance Information to be used in conjunction with the Semantic Definition Format (SDF) for Data and Interactions of Things (draft-ietf-asdf-sdf) and will ultimately define Representation Formats for them as well as ways to use SDF Models to describe them. // The present revision –06 takes into account the discussion that // happened during IETF 123 and 124 as well as the interim meetings // inbetween, and intends to harmonize different instance-related // message concepts via a common format.
